description:
A woman is hired as an idol for her beautiful moles under her eyes. But when the day of her big show comes, the producer disappears! Is a crime involved?
Source: Funimation

titles.title: Why Not Join the Staring-at-Eye-Moles Squad?
À la recherche du grain de beauté parfait
لم لا تنضمين إلى فرقة ممعنات النظر بالشامات
泣きぼくろ見つめ隊はいかが
